directions: In a large bowl, combine the spinach, apples, Cheddar cheese and walnuts.  Toss lightly to blend.
In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, maple syrup and olive oil. Pour over the salad, and stir to coat. I like to use a bowl with a lid so I can shake the ingredients. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 Granny Smith apples, cored and sliced
title: Jackie's Spinach and Apple Salad
